fields.name: usesConsumerParameters
fields.label: Uses consumer parameters
fields.help: Define consumer parameters to be submitted to the algorithm before usage.

fields.name: name
fields.label: Parameter Name
fields.help: The name of the parameter to ask for. This will be the JSON key handed to the algorithm for this parameter.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: A custom parameter changing the behaviour of the algorithm.

fields.name: type
fields.label: Parameter Type
fields.help: The type of the parameter to ask for. This influences how the parameter is displayed for the consumer before the algorithm is used.

fields.name: options
fields.label: Select Options
fields.placeholder: Define the options for the user to select from

fields.name: default
fields.label: Default Value
fields.placeholder: Define the default value for the current parameter
